column4: can anyone help me with the blanks in terminal server client for VNC protocol, i want to access my friend XP i know its IP address ?
i can help you
thx , aaron. what i have to put in the Domain box ?
nothing
ok, in the Client hostname ?
just choose VNC for the protocol and press connect.
An Error has accrued
try this. open your terminal... and run vncviewer
can you give me your IP ? you can set VNC in the view mode to be secure. my friend is sleeping
I don't have anything set up.
are you sure you have vncviewer installed?
yes, and after i entered that command a dialog box appeared
if you share the IP you're trying to connect to i can verify that port 5900 is open.
or you can, using nmap. if you're familiar.
, sorry. but i can't understand you very well. what do you want me to do ?
do you want my IP address ?
i want the ip that you are trying to connect to.
it sounds like the server isn't setup properly.
but his PC is off.
but his PC is off.
then what are you trying to do? heh
he just go to sleep. if you don't mind we can do that. tell how to the server. and i give you my IP address
are you there ?
